## Results

### PART 1: Functional group richness effect

Test overall effects of number of functional groups (functional group richness) on standing biomass across the climate grid.

```{r}
#| label: fig-fg-fichness-effects
#| fig-cap: "Estimated effects from the mixed-effects model of number of functional groups on standing biomass. The model coefficients with confidence intervals for functional group richness, precipitation, and temperature and their interactions are shown."
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

# Load the figure from targets
tar_load(fig_fg_richness_effects)

# Display plot
fig_fg_richness_effects
```
